ai-patthana17.19:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.19:0.3_0: Seeing what is good, pleasant and internally,
ai-patthana17.19:1.1_0: I am skilled in the middle of the teaching, not for the object of the meditation subject, nor is a condition for the object.
ai-patthana17.19:1.1_1: The eighteen bases have been approvals, supported by the eighteen have been produced in brief, and there are three eighteen years.
ai-patthana17.19:2.1_0: Not skilled in the Dhamma, nor is a condition for the object, but not for the investigation of principles;
ai-patthana17.19:2.1_1: There are eighteen meditations in brief, eighteen objects, that is to say, eighteen bases in the world, and eighteen years.
ai-patthana17.19:3.1_0: A skillful quality doesn’t give rise to a foundation for extra effort. Mindfulness is a condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana17.19:4.1_0: Not doing anywhere else dealing with skillful qualities, the outcome does not give rise to the cause or condition.
